imppkg.harmony module¶

A command-line interface for calculating the harmonic mean of user-provided numbers.

meta public:

imppkg.harmony._calculate_results(nums)¶

This function will have a coment to send to sphix

Parameters:

nums (list[float])

Return type:

float

imppkg.harmony._parse_num(inputs)¶

This function parses the parameters from the cli.

Parameters:

  • inpus (list[str]) – A list of numbers in passed as strings from the CLI.

  • inputs (list[str])

Returns:

Casts the numbers passed as string to float. The output is a list of floats.

Return type:

list[float]

imppkg.harmony.main()¶

pubpypack-harmony-ricardo-zambrano
